getDiff

public static int getDiff(java.util.Date pFrom,
                          java.util.Date pTo)
Compute the difference between two dates in years, months, and days. The result is returned in a concatenated integer value of the form ymmdd. So the difference between Apr 20, 2003 and Apr 15, 2025 would be 211126 (21 years, 11 months, and 26 days) since 21 years and 11 months gets you to May 20 2025, there are 31 days in May of 2025, and it takes 25 days to go from May 20 2025 to April 15 2025! To split the values off, NOT #years = return value / 10000, #months = return value % 10000 / 100 #days = return value % 100. This method will return a negative value if the 'from' value is after the 'to' value (i.e. getDiff( from, to) = -getDiff( to, from )).

Parameters:
pFrom - The time to compute the difference from.
pTo - Date The time to compute the difference to.
Returns:
int The difference in the two dates in the form mmdd.

nbRepairs

public int nbRepairs(java.lang.String URN)
Returns number of times a product has been repaired

Specified by:
nbRepairs in interface ConfigurePsion

isExchangeable

public java.lang.String isExchangeable(java.lang.String URN)
Tells replacement mode of SGTIN Query EPCIS for "retail_selling/sold" event, check extension product:warrantyBeginDate or (if missing) eventTime Replacement mode depends on date of buying: if (warrantyBeginDate is null) : unknown else if (currentDate < warrantyBeginDate + 3 months) : new else if (currentDate < warrantyBeginDate + 2 years) : used else : no

Specified by:
isExchangeable in interface ConfigurePsion
Returns:
"new", "used", "no" or "unknown"

isExchangeableWithBPEvent

public java.lang.String isExchangeableWithBPEvent(java.lang.String BPEventID,
                                                  java.lang.String SGTIN)
Tells replacement mode of SGTIN associated to a RMA Returns an XML string <response> <status>(1 for exchangeable, 0 otherwise)</status> <userinfo>"new", "used", "no" or "unknown"</userinfo> </response>

Specified by:
isExchangeableWithBPEvent in interface ConfigurePsion
Returns:
XML string
